profile.name: Addy Osmani
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Google | Open Source Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a passion for web development, AI-powered tools, and open-source contributions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple CLI tools using JavaScript and TypeScript for Google's internal projects.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement browser-based applications leveraging AI-powered tools.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to open-source projects such as firew0rks, enhance, and say.
Developed and maintained multiple web applications using JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and React.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated open-source projects such as CLI tools and image editors.
Collaborated with other maintainers to resolve issues and improve project quality.
